    • canEndCurrentCommunication

      public boolean canEndCurrentCommunication()
      Checks if this terminal can end the current interactive communication.
      Returns:
      true if this terminal is busy (i.e., it has an active interactive communication) and it was the originator of this communication.

    • canStartCommunication

      public boolean canStartCommunication()
      Checks if this terminal can start a new communication.
      Returns:
      true if this terminal is neither off neither busy, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns string that represents this Terminal

      Formats:

      terminal-key|owner-key|state|debt|paid

      terminal-key|owner-key|state|debt|paid|friend1,friend2,...,friendN

      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
